name: LexiSmartSpaces
0:
”Alexa, ask lexi smart spaces to turn on all lexi lights.”
”Alexa, ask lexi smart spaces to set kitchen lights to red color”
”Alexa, ask lexi smart spaces to set all lights to fifty percent brightness”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lexi smart spaces
des:
With Alexa you can now control all your Lexi Smart Spaces. Turn them on or off. Set color and brightness for individual lights or group of lights and many more.

To use the Lexi Smart Spaces skill, you need a Lexi Gateway. You need to create an account on the Lexi platform and configure your Lexi Gateway and connect smart devices to the Lexi Gateway. You will need to log in to your Lexi account and select the Lexi Gateway to pair it will your Lexi Smart Spaces skill. Once the pairing is successful, you will be able to control the devices using both the voice interface as well as the Alexa app interface.
